alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:33AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with up to 3 feet on the high peaks of the Park Range. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph at times. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times with snow and blowing snow significantly reducing visibility at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
